00620     class _OgreExport MaterialPtr : public SharedPtr<Material> 
00621     {
00622     public:
00623         MaterialPtr() : SharedPtr<Material>() {}
00624         explicit MaterialPtr(Material* rep) : SharedPtr<Material>(rep) {}
00625         MaterialPtr(const MaterialPtr& r) : SharedPtr<Material>(r) {} 
00626         MaterialPtr(const ResourcePtr& r) : SharedPtr<Material>()
00627         {
00628             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00629             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00630             {
00631                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00632                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00633                 pRep = static_cast<Material*>(r.getPointer());
00634                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00635                 if (pUseCount)
00636                 {
00637                     ++(*pUseCount);
00638                 }
00639             }
00640         }
00641 
00643         MaterialPtr& operator=(const ResourcePtr& r)
00644         {
00645             if (pRep == static_cast<Material*>(r.getPointer()))
00646                 return *this;
00647             release();
00648             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00649             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00650             {
00651                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00652                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00653                 pRep = static_cast<Material*>(r.getPointer());
00654                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00655                 if (pUseCount)
00656                 {
00657                     ++(*pUseCount);
00658                 }
00659             }
00660             return *this;
00661         }
00662     };
